YAVRTOS Data Structures

Here are the data structures with brief descriptions:
mailbox_tStructure describing mailboxes
mutex_tA structure describing a mutex
semaphore_tStructure describing a semaphore
system_struct

For internal use only.

Structure used by the system to hold the system stack, and a flag indicating whether an ISR is currently being executed

task_tStructure describing a task
